duties_responsibilities.duty: Support the Pastry Chef in all kitchen preparations with a strong attention to detail.
Assist with cleaning, cutting vegetables, and preparing main dishes, desserts, appetizers, and snacks.
Stock and set up kitchen stations, supporting the Chef team in the daily preparation and maintenance of the kitchen.
Take care of the conservation of kitchen products in compliance with food safety standards and regulations.

education_certification.credential: At least one year of experience in the hospitality industry within the Kitchen area.
